sentences.en: Beth's incoherence told Amy that something was terribly wrong.
sentences.cn: 贝丝语无伦次，艾米知道一定是出了很严重的事。

sentences.en: Even clever people are not terribly clever when put on the spot.
sentences.cn: 即便是聪明人在面对难题时也未必就能表现得特别聪明。

sentences.en: I could see that something was terribly wrong.
sentences.cn: 我能觉察到有什么事很不对头。

sentences.en: I suffered terribly when she died.
sentences.cn: 她死的时候，我伤心透了。

sentences.en: I was something of a wallflower; I was terribly shy.
sentences.cn: 我算是朵墙花，因为我特别害羞。

sentences.en: I'm terribly sorry to bother you at this hour.
sentences.cn: 这个时候打搅您，我万分抱歉。

sentences.en: I’m terribly sorry to have kept you waiting.
It must be terribly frustrating to lobby and get absolutely nowhere.
sentences.cn: 游说未取得一点结果，一定让人非常沮丧。

sentences.en: My son has suffered terribly. He has lost his best friend.
sentences.cn: 我儿子遭受了巨大痛苦，他失去了最要好的朋友。

sentences.en: People are still terribly apprehensive about the future.
sentences.cn: 人们对于将来仍然非常担心。

sentences.en: She is terribly offended, angered and hurt by this.
sentences.cn: 她认为这是对她的严重冒犯，感到非常愤怒和深受伤害。

sentences.en: The coach was not terribly worried about his team’s poor performance.
sentences.cn: 教练对他所执教球队的糟糕表现并不是十分担忧。

sentences.en: They are terribly upset by the break-up of their parents' marriage.
sentences.cn: 父母婚姻破裂让他们极度苦恼。

sentences.en: This has been so nice, so terribly kind of you.
sentences.cn: 您这么做真是太好心，太令我们感激不尽了。

sentences.en: To be a parent is a terribly difficult thing.
You can imagine he was terribly upset.
sentences.cn: 你能想象得出来，他当时心里乱得要命。

words.tran_cn: 可怕的；很糟的；令人讨厌的
极好的；极其的，非常的；可怕的
